medium: Fused, slumped, manipulated and wheel ground mosaic glass
marks: Signture and Title at edge of rim on top surface, incised: [Klaus Moj
description: bowl form with rounded bottom with small flat foot; very wide, square rim; small bowl; striped designs of predominately orange, blue and yellow; some cloudy stripes running perpendicular to bright colored stripes
creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser
